data.title: Saban Capital Group LLC
data.meta_description:
Saban Capital Group LLC | 2,128 followers on LinkedIn. A Diversified Global Investment Portfolio | Saban Capital Group (“SCG”) is a leading private investment firm based in Los Angeles that manages a globally diversified portfolio of investments across real estate, venture capital, growth equity, private equity, public equity and fixed income.

We seek opportunities to support the growth of promising companies by taking an active role in their development through both controlling and minority investments. We believe our team members’ diverse backgrounds and deep experience provide us an edge as we drive success for both our companies and investors.
data.text:
